privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.identityText: The Tribu Baby application is managed by Christopher Continente, application manager and independent developer. For any questions regarding personal data, you can contact: tribubabytracker@gmail.com.
privacyPolicy.dataCollection: Collection and Use of Personal Data
privacyPolicy.dataCollectionText: Tribu Baby collects personal data to provide an optimal user experience. The data collected includes:
privacyPolicy.identificationInfo: Identification information (name, email, postal code, etc.).
privacyPolicy.babyData: Data related to the baby's habits and health:
privacyPolicy.feeding: Feeding times and quantities (breastfeeding and/or bottles).
privacyPolicy.sleep: Sleep and nap times and durations.
privacyPolicy.rgpd: This information is collected in compliance with current regulations, including the GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation).
privacyPolicy.provideService: Provide and personalize the application's services.
privacyPolicy.improveApp: Improve the application based on user feedback.
privacyPolicy.medicalAdvice: The user is informed that the advice provided via the application does not replace a medical diagnosis provided by a healthcare professional. The user is invited to consult the appropriate healthcare professionals.
privacyPolicy.dataSharingText: Data is never sold to third parties. It may be shared with Firebase, the application's host, to ensure proper technical functioning and data backup.
privacyPolicy.userRightsText: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
privacyPolicy.contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at: tribubabytracker@gmail.com.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityText: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionText: Personal data collected is retained for up to one year after the user uninstalls the application.
privacyPolicy.cookiesText: Tribu Baby uses cookies to improve navigation and analyze application usage. You can manage your preferences in your device settings.

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice
legalNotice.identificationText: The Tribu Baby application is published by:
legalNotice.name: Name: Christopher Continente, independent developer
legalNotice.hostingText: The application and its data are hosted by:
legalNotice.address: Address: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
legalNotice.responsibilityText: Tribu Baby makes every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information disseminated on the application, but cannot be held responsible for errors or omissions.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.preambleText: Any person (hereinafter referred to as the 'User') accessing the Tribu Baby mobile application or the website www.tribubaby.com (hereinafter referred to as the 'Services'), declares to accept these terms of use (hereinafter referred to as the 'Terms'). The Terms define the rights and obligations of the User in the context of using the Services. Before any use, it is recommended to read the Terms as well as the privacy policy. Tribu Baby reserves the right, at any time and unilaterally, to update or modify these Terms. In case of substantial modification, Tribu Baby undertakes to inform the User by email or via the application. The User is invited to regularly consult the Terms and declares to have read and accepted them.
termsOfUse.warningText: Tribu Baby provides advice adapted to the information provided by the User. This advice does not in any way replace a medical diagnosis provided by a healthcare professional. The User is invited to systematically consult a qualified professional in case of any questions about their baby's health.
termsOfUse.registrationText: To use the application, the User must download the application and create an account (hereinafter referred to as the 'Account'). When creating the Account, the User provides an email address and a postal code. The User undertakes to provide accurate information and to keep it up to date. Registration is nominative and personal. Tribu Baby reserves the right to suspend any account containing inaccurate or outdated information.
termsOfUse.useOfServicesText: The User remains responsible for the use of the Services. It is prohibited to: Modify or decompile the application. Use the Services for purposes contrary to the law. Publish content that infringes copyright or privacy rights.
termsOfUse.intellectualPropertyText: The content of the application and the website (texts, images, SEO) is the exclusive property of Tribu Baby. Users retain ownership of the data they record and can share it freely.
termsOfUse.availabilityText: The Services are available 24/7, subject to possible breakdowns or technical maintenance.
termsOfUse.responsibilityText: Tribu Baby cannot be held responsible in case of a problem related to an incompatible device or a malfunction beyond its control. The User is responsible for the use of their account.
termsOfUse.applicableLawText: These Terms are subject to French law. In case of dispute, an amicable solution will be preferred before any legal action. You can contact us at: tribubabytracker@gmail.com.

termsOfUse.preambleText: Toda persona (en adelante, el 'Usuario') que acceda a la aplicaci√≥n m√≥vil Tribu Baby o al sitio web www.tribubaby.com (en adelante, los 'Servicios'), declara aceptar estas condiciones generales de uso (en adelante, las 'CGU').
